name: Manas Ranjan Lenka
content: Manas Ranjan Lenka - KIIT School of Computer Engineering Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Manas Ranjan Lenka Manas Ranjan Lenka Manas Ranjan Lenka Associate ProfessorManas Ranjan Lenka has started his career in the software industry and worked in various telecom technologies, i.e. 4G (LTE), 3G, 2G , IPSec, SIGCOMP protocols development etc. for 9 years. Then switched to education industry in 2013 and is currently teaching the B.Tech and M. Tech students of the School of Computer Engineering, KIIT(Deemed to be University). He holds a PhD degree in Computer Science and Engineering.
